title: Abracadabra
lyrics:
[intro] 
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa

(Em)Pay the toll, to the angels
Drawing (Em)circles, in the clouds
(Em)Keep your mind, on the distance
When the (Em)devil turns a(Em)round

[pre-chorus]
(Em)Hold me in your (D)heart tonight
In the (A)magic of the (G)dark moonlight
(Em)Save me from this (D)empty fi-(A)ight
In the (G)game of life
Like a (Em)poem said by a (Bm)lady in red
You hear the (A)last few words of your (G)life
With a (Em)haunting dance, now you're (Bm)both in a trance
It's time to (A)cast your spell on the (G)night

[chorus]
(Em)"Abracadabra, amor-(Bm)oo-na-na
Abra(A)cadabra, morta-(G)ooh-ga-ga
(Em)Abracadabra, abra-(Bm)oo-na-na"
In her (A)tongue she said, "(G)Death or love to(Em)night"

[interlude]
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)Feel the beat under your feet, thе (F#m)floor's on (G)fire
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa

(Em)Choose the road, on thе west side
As the (Em)dust flies, watch it burn
(Em)Don't waste time, on a feeling
Use your (Em)passion, no return

[pre-chorus]
(Em)Hold me in your (D)heart tonight
In the (A)magic of the (G)dark moonlight
(Em)Save me from this (D)empty fi-(A)ight
In the (G)game of life

Like a (Em)poem said by a (Bm)lady in red
You hear the (A)last few words of your (G)life
With a (Em)haunting dance, now you're (Bm)both in a trance
It's time to (A)cast your spell on the (G)night

[chorus]
(Em)"Abracadabra, amor-(Bm)oo-na-na
Abra(A)cadabra, morta-(G)ooh-ga-ga
(Em)Abracadabra, abra-(Bm)oo-na-na"
In her (A)tongue she said, "(G)Death or love to(Em)night"

[interlude]
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)Feel the beat under your feet, thе (F#m)floor's on (G)fire
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa

[bridge]
(G)Phantom of the (Em)dance floor, (Bm)come to (A)me (G)
Sing for me a (Em)sinful (Bm)melo(A)dy (G)
Ah-ah-ah-ah, (Em)aaah, ah-(Bm)ah ah (A)ah (G)
Ah-ah-ah-ah, (Em)aaah, ah-(Bm)ah ah (A)ah (G)

[interlude]
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)Feel the beat under your feet, thе (F#m)floor's on (G)fire
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa

[chorus]
(Em)"Abracadabra, amor-(Bm)oo-na-na
Abra(A)cadabra, morta-(G)ooh-ga-ga
(Em)Abracadabra, abra-(Bm)oo-na-na"
In her (A)tongue she said, "(G)Death or love to(Em)night"

[outro]
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em)A-bracadabra, abraca(F#m)daaaa-(G)braaaa
(Em) [end]
